description: Describes the available Amazon OpenSearch Service Reserved Instance offerings for a given Region. For more information, see Reserved Instances in Amazon OpenSearch Service.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: When nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Send the request again using the returned token to retrieve the next page.

nested_items.name: ReservedInstanceOfferingId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Reserved Instance offering.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The OpenSearch instance type offered by the Reserved Instance offering.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: The duration, in seconds, for which the offering will reserve the OpenSearch instance.

nested_items.name: FixedPrice
nested_items.description: The upfront fixed charge you will pay to purchase the specific Reserved Instance offering.

nested_items.name: UsagePrice
nested_items.description: The hourly rate at which you're charged for the domain using this Reserved Instance.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency code for the Reserved Instance offering.

nested_items.name: PaymentOption
nested_items.description: Payment option for the Reserved Instance offering.

nested_items.name: RecurringCharges
nested_items.description: The recurring charge to your account, regardless of whether you creates any domains using the offering.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeAmount
nested_items.description: The monetary amount of the recurring charge.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeFrequency
nested_items.description: The frequency of the recurring charge.
